review: Perfect thickness and action.What else can I say?  You won't be sorry you got these, they are all I'll get from now on.
Classic design.  I remember these from 35 years ago in high school band.  They haven't changed much, don't fix it if it's not broken.

Replacing your pickguard?  Lost a screw?  Authentic replacement screws if you need them.  I ordered these with a new pickguard for my Strat in case I lost or boogered up one of the screws.  Exactly like stock screws.
These are the best celluloid shell-colored thin picks around.  Tried all the off brands but came back to Fender picks in the end.

Not really bright enough. Both bright and lower light levels are exactly the same.  I would look for something else if I didn't already have this.  OK for reading a small book in bed, but doesn't cover the sheet music brightly enough.
